about_me.des: I am a Back-End developer looking for architectural and design challenges.

projects.githubdater: Application updater using GitHub as a server.
projects.critisteam: Java library to retrieve Steam reviews data.

career.capgemini_des: Now I am working for Capgemini as a Software Engineer at the Financial Services (Banking/Insurance).
career.ms2i_des: Studies of IT projects management and software architecture/design.

career.finley_des: I started to design and implement web applications (Java EE / Spring, AngularJS, jQuery) as well as native windows application in (C#, WPF / WinForms, Entity Framework).
